lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: Who was Abram married to? What problem did she have?
answers: Rachel, she didn’t like to travel
Leah, she was afraid of leaving home

questions.text: What did God tell Abram to do?
answers: Go to a land that God would show him
Build a giant tower to reach the sky

questions.text: God promised to grow Abram’s family into... what?
What did God promise to do to people who blessed or cursed Abram?
answers: Bless those who blessed him, curse those who cursed him
Punish everyone who spoke to Abram

questions.text: What promise did God make about all the nations of the world?
answers: All nations would be blessed through Abram
All nations would speak the same language
Abram would have a house in every single nation

questions.text: How old was Abram when he left?
What was the name of the land God led Abram to?
Who appeared to Abram in the land of Canaan?
answers: An angel with a fiery sword

questions.text: What promise did God make to Abram in Canaan?
answers: To give the land to his family
To make Abram the king of all nations
To build a temple for Abram
To give him endless riches and treasures

questions.text: How did Abram’s family bless all nations?
answers: Abram’s many-times-great grandson Jesus came to save us from our sins
Abram’s children taught everyone how to farm
Abram became the king of the world
